it.polimi.se2019.view.client

Class ModelRep

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.view.client.ModelRep

  • public class ModelRep
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that conatains the representation of the model. Each representation in updates whenever the client receive a message of type UPDATE_REPS.
    Author:
    MarcerAndrea
